document.full_text: bernard hopkins, 46, became the oldest man to win a boxing world title on saturday when he defeated canadian jean pascal by unanimous decision to claim the wbc and ibo light-heavyweight belts.
document.title: hopkins, 46, beats pascal to become oldest world title winner
